text: Hey <@U01U201MTQF>, are you getting this issue only when you bundle up in production mode (minifying the files) or in development mode as well?
Hmm, I’ve only used them minified actually. Let me try it in dev mode.

It works when I don’t minify it! Thanks <@U053XFFREHH>

Now that I think of it, does HubSpot handle the minifying itself?

Awesome! I think it has to do with minified version of syntax and HubSpot’s build in mechanism to handle it. May be you need to do some research around: how HubSpot is handling it behind the scenes :smile:
it’s possible that the minified JS file you are trying to upload is not in the correct format or is missing required elements that are needed for it to be uploaded successfully.

Thanks a lot! Just realized that i missed a warning that HubSpot minifies all the assets itself and I should not upload minified code.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/cdn#javascript-and-css-minification>
